attributes.title: Siddha Tradition Consciousness Only key for 2012 - Nithyananda Morning Satsang (20 Nov 2010) Message
attributes.description:
Paramahamsa Nithyananda was adamant this morning: Siddha Consciousness is the only key to 2012. Before entering into the different states of consciousness, understanding the different states of Consciousness, he explained the purpose of working and studying the consciousness. 
When you reclaim the pure consciousness state in you, that restful awareness, you get into a spot or a space where you see the whole. Not just things related to the 5 senses you are carrying but everything. When you see the whole the picture, your life changes. The idea about your life changes. 
Just this morning one person was asking him, "Swamiji, every day morning we see you and so much goes on, someday a lot of good news, some days bad, but everyday you're back fresh, alive, satsang happens. How?"
His reply was, "I just know very clearly, experientially whatever may happen in the outer world, there is something in me that is untouched which I experience as me, will be eternally available doing its job of blessing, initiating, elevating human consciousness. Whatever I'm doing now I'll do as long as the sun and moon exist. I just know that I am eternal. What I am doing will be happening eternally. Whatever gives me fulfillment will be going on around me eternally. That is the only reason nothing is shaking me. Please Understand, when you rest in the pure consciousness, this understanding will land in you. With that understanding, living your life is living enlightenment."

Paramahamsa Nithyananda is a living enlightened master and a rare incarnation, an avatar who is the spiritual force for our millennium. He has inspired over 4 million lives worldwide to a new conscious age of enlightened living and has healed many thousands from chronic diseases and mental problems & traumas. The most watched and most popular spiritual teacher on Youtube globally with over 7000 hours of discourses, he has dedicated his life and the spiritual mission with over 1200 full-time volunteers to teach the science of enlightenment. 

 

His spiritual teachings, life solutions and meditation workshops are the extraordinary works of a Spiritual Genius. 'Inner Awakening' is his ultimate offering to create a New Man - a 21 days enlightenment intensive program for a permanent breakthrough in consciousness and to experience living enlightenment, a conflict-free life. Thousands from around the planet are experiencing their Inner Awakening with total physical wellbeing, deep emotional healing, release from past life traumas, DNA reprogramming and actualizing their limitless potential by transcending into a zone of bliss. Go to www.innerawakening.org or www.dhyanapeetam.org to begin your extraordinary way of existing this Dec2010!
